name: DexWallet
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Decentralized Exchange Wallet (DWT) is an ecosystem where everyone can feel centralized exchanges and keeping their funds under their control with more security. DexWallet security system will be encrypted and strengthened, where all users can use their funds safely
Also multichain supported,staking & NFT marketplace live in the wallet app.
User can easily participate IDO-ICO and buy-sell tokens like centralized exchange in Decentralized system. 
DexWallet Apps is available in
Android App : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wallet.dex
iOS App : https://apps.apple.com/us/app/dex-wallet/id1658651116
